Text: Pachyornis:  The most notable species being "Pachyornis elephantopus" - the Heavy-Footed Moa.

Text: Pachyornis:  They were generally similar to the Eastern Moa or the Broad-billed moa of the genus "Euryapteryx", but differed in having a pointed bill and being more heavyset in general.
